sentence.Network_en: Visitors remember a lean, cheerful figure on horseback urging on his men.
sentence.Network_cn: 访客们记住了一个瘦削、乐观的人骑在马上为他的手下鼓劲。

sentence.Network_en: Many people in this area ride horseback.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个地区有很多人骑马。

sentence.Network_en: In remote mountain areas, voters arrived on horseback.
sentence.Network_cn: 在偏远山区，选民骑着马赶来了。

entry.def: If you do something on horseback, you do it while riding a horse.

example.ex: In remote mountain areas, voters arrived on horseback.
example.tran: 在偏远山区，选民骑着马赶来了。

entry.def: A horseback ride is a ride on a horse.

means.word_mean: 1. on the back of a horse;

sentences.en: Andrew traversed the prairie on horseback.
sentences.cn: 安德鲁骑马穿越大草原。

sentences.en: Agues come on horseback,but go away on foot.
sentences.cn: 病来如山倒,病去如抽丝。
